description: Routing: navigating to Events Catalog renders screen and header
Deep link: ?eventType preselects and opens details drawer for event
Filters: search matches name/description/event_type
Filters: category dropdown filters results
Filters: status dropdown filters results
Filters: source toggle filters system vs tenant entries
Filters: clear resets to defaults and repopulates list
View toggle: grid/list toggles and persists across reload
Pagination: grid shows 24 per page and total counts
Pagination: list shows 50 per page and total counts
Event card: renders icon/name/event_type/status/description
Event card: schemaRef badge renders known/unknown/missing states
Event card: attached workflows count matches server response
Event card: quick metrics show '-' when no data
API: listEventCatalogWithMetrics returns combined system+tenant entries with filters/pagination
API: listEventCatalogWithMetrics quick metrics are correct for known fixtures (executions/success/latency)
Details drawer: opens on card click and shows schema + metadata
Details drawer: schema preview renders top-level props and required list
Details drawer: full schema modal opens, highlights JSON, and copy button works
API: listAttachedWorkflowsByEventType returns published workflows triggered by event_type
Details drawer: attached workflows list shows name/version/status/system/paused badges
Details drawer: open-in-designer navigates and selects workflow
Simulate: dialog opens from card and loads schema by payload_schema_ref
Simulate: form mode generates defaults from schema and validates required fields
Simulate: JSON mode blocks invalid JSON and surfaces schema errors
Simulate: correlationKey is optional and persisted per event
Simulate: schemaRef override changes payloadSchemaRef sent to ingestion
API: simulate uses submitWorkflowEventAction and returns startedRuns and event id
Simulate: success summary shows started runs and links to run details
Simulate: ingestion error shows error_message and retains payload for retry
Metrics: panel opens from card and defaults to last 7 days
API: metrics summary counts match workflow_runtime_events fixture data
API: metrics run stats (runs started, success rate, avg duration) match fixture data
API: metrics time series returns daily buckets that sum to totals
Metrics: chart renders buckets and updates when range changes
Metrics: recent events table shows status + timestamps + correlationKey
Metrics: deep link to workflow events list preserves event_name filter
Attach: clicking Attach creates draft workflow and navigates to designer
Attach: new draft workflow trigger.eventName equals selected event_type
Attach: payloadSchemaRef defaults to event payload_schema_ref when present
Attach: trigger.sourcePayloadSchemaRef defaults to event schemaRef
Detach: confirmation dialog appears and describes publish impact
API: detach publishes a new version with trigger removed
Detach: system workflow detach requires workflow:admin (403 for non-admin)
Detach: after success, attached workflow list/count updates
Custom event: Define Custom Event dialog opens and validates required fields
Custom event: schemaRef selection uses schema registry list and rejects unknown refs
Custom event: inline schema editor validates JSON and stores payload_schema
Custom event: event_type uniqueness enforced per tenant
Permissions: view requires workflow:read
Permissions: simulate/attach/detach require workflow:manage
Audit: simulate emits audit entry with event_type/correlationKey
Audit: attach/detach emit audit entries with workflow id/version and event_type
Redaction: recent event payload preview redacts sensitive keys
